info: You must be at least 18 years old to use the App. By using the App, you represent and warrant that you have the right, authority, and capacity to enter into this agreement and to abide by all of the terms and conditions of this agreement.

info: You agree not to post, upload, or otherwise make available any images that: Contain nudity, sexually explicit content, or pornography. Depict violence, hatred, or cruelty.
